comment._content: how timely!- my best day at the Horse Show was the day the Leaving cert results came out --it was  a Thursday; "Ladies Day"--and we phoned the school from a call box near the show rings-- we all got good news!

comment._content: This looks like so much fun. I noticed the hats right away. I wonder how much those behemoths weighed?

comment.author: 100631863@N07
comment._content: I'd say that's turn of the last century based on ladies' dresses - corsets, huge hats and floor length skirts were mostly out by 1920?

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/100631863@N07] Yes, you're right! Knocking a decade off our estimated date - now circa 1910, thank you.
